title: EYNMIN Women's Sleeveless Bodycon Corset Maxi Dress Spaghetti Strap Ruched Elegant Evening Wedding Guest Long Formal Dresses
description: Material: Formal prom maxi dress made of 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane. Soft, skin-friendly and stretchy fabric, double layer design and not see through, comfortable to wear

Features: Long evening party dress, adjustable spaghetti strap, fish bones, backless, zipper back, lined, floor length, adopts the close fitting style and mermaid hem design, your body curve could be highlighted, show your noble and elegant
Occasions: Wedding guest dresses for women suitable for party, prom, wedding, bridesmaid, birthday, homecoming, cocktail, evening gown, date night, dinner, club, night out
Size: XS = US 0-2; S = US 2-4; M = US 4-6; L = US 8-10; XL = US 10-12; XXL = US 12-14. For a better dressing experience, we recommend iron in low before wearing
Washing Care: Ruched bodycon maxi dress hand wash in 30 degree water, hang to dry in the shade, no bleaching
